title: Boost Your Business Productivity with Trello Premium | Trello
content: Trello Premium Add AI to your boards and get unlimited automation. Plus, get advanced Mirror card functionality. Just $10 a month. A community of millions of users around the globe rely on Trello to organize their daily tasks and activities. 80% of Fortune 500 companies use Trello to improve efficiency. Maximize productivity with Trello Premium Unlock full planner access Drag and drop cards on a synced calendar that works with Google Calendar and Outlook. Stay more in sync No more missed updates and redundancies — mirror cards to view to-dos across boards. More power at your fingertips Cross off tasks more effectively with Custom Fields and advanced checklists. Unlock full planner access Drag and drop cards on a synced calendar that works with Google Calendar and Outlook. Stay more in sync No more missed updates and redundancies — mirror cards to view to-dos across boards. More power at your fingertips Cross off tasks more effectively with Custom Fields and advanced checklists. With Trello Premium you’ll get everything you love in our free version, plus: Advanced Planner and Mirror Card Functionality Custom Fields, advanced checklists, admin controls Data export Unlimited storage (250MB/file) Unlimited boards and automations Priority support Join a community of millions of users globally who are using Trello to get more done. Frequently asked questions +What are the benefits of Trello Premium? With Trello Premium, teams can track and visualize multiple projects in several ways with Board, Table, Timeline, and Calendar views. Trello Premium includes privacy controls and other administrative tools that are helpful to businesses that want to take greater control of their boards and data. +How long is Trello Premium trial? All users can enroll their Workspace in a free 14 day trial of Trello Premium. With that trial, users within your Workspace can create unlimited Trello boards with unlimited options for automation. Your team can test-drive the convenience and utility of visualizing your work in Table, Calendar, and Timeline views, along with access to other Premium features. +How many boards are included in Trello Premium? All users with a Trello Premium Workspace will get access to create unlimited Trello boards and unlimited Workspace automation commands. +How does Trello Premium billing work? When you upgrade your Workspace to Trello Premium, you have the option to choose between a monthly or annual billing plan. Annual billing is paid in advance and gives a discount for each member as compared to monthly billing. Haven’t tried Trello before?
